questions.questionText: What is the SI unit of force?
questions.explanation: The SI unit of force is Newton (N), named after Sir Isaac Newton
Deficiency of Vitamin C causes Scurvy, characterized by bleeding gums and weakness

questions.questionText: How many bones are there in an adult human body?
questions.explanation: An adult human body has 206 bones

questions.questionText: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.explanation: The chemical symbol for Gold is Au, derived from the Latin word 'Aurum'

questions.questionText: Which is the largest organ in the human body?
questions.explanation: Skin is the largest organ in the human body by surface area

questions.questionText: Newton's second law of motion is represented by which formula?
questions.explanation: Newton's second law is F = ma (Force = mass Ã— acceleration)

questions.questionText: Malaria is caused by which organism?
questions.explanation: Malaria is caused by Plasmodium, a protozoan parasite transmitted by mosquitoes

questions.questionText: What is the atomic number of Hydrogen?
questions.explanation: Hydrogen has atomic number 1, it is the lightest element

questions.questionText: Which vitamin is essential for blood clotting?
questions.explanation: Vitamin K is essential for blood clotting

questions.questionText: How many groups are there in the modern periodic table?
questions.explanation: The modern periodic table has 18 vertical groups

questions.questionText: Deficiency of Vitamin D causes which disease?
questions.explanation: Deficiency of Vitamin D causes Rickets, affecting bone development in children

questions.questionText: What is the SI unit of power?
questions.explanation: The SI unit of power is Watt (W), named after James Watt

questions.questionText: Which is the smallest bone in the human body?
questions.explanation: Stapes (stirrup bone) in the middle ear is the smallest bone in the human body

questions.questionText: Tuberculosis is caused by which type of microorganism?
questions.explanation: Tuberculosis (TB) is caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium tuberculosis

questions.questionText: How many periods are there in the modern periodic table?
questions.explanation: The modern periodic table has 7 horizontal periods
